nodes.text: R3-D3 was an R3-series astromech droid assigned to the maintenance of the StarSpeeder 3000 line of ships. R3 series astromechs were usually not used in sockets of craft as navigators due to their limited five coordinate memory. R3-D3 is seen inside of the Droid Repair Center.
This droid can be seen at Star Tours. Hasbro released R3-D3 as an exclusive Star Tours action figure.
